messages.title: Green energy scheme takes off with Hyper Hubs at Poppleton
messages.content: Poppleton and Monks Cross park and ride sites are set to produce electricity from solar panels. The Lib Dem led council's executive recently approved a £1m scheme to install solar panels in parkings bays at these park and ride sites.

messages.title: Your local councillors are backing KEITH ASPDEN
messages.content: We need a local MP that works hard for us and has a genuine record of community action and is the only credible candidate who lives locally.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will take the urgent action needed to protect our environment, making Britain a world leader in renewable energy and green technology.
The Liberal Democrats will ensure our children get billions more to secure the future of the NHS after years of Conservative neglect.

mentions.tacticalSituation: This election is a clear choice between the Lib Dems and the Conservatives.

issues.economy: The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.
issues.environment: The Liberal Democrats will take the urgent action needed to protect our environment, making Britain a world leader in renewable energy and green technology.
issues.health: The Liberal Democrats will ensure our children get billions more to secure the future of the NHS after years of Conservative neglect.

endorsements.endorsement: The Conservatives have become a party promoting an extreme version of Brexit and more isolationism.
I've worked in the green industry for 20 years now and it's clear to me the Liberal Democrats have the best plan to tackle the climate emergency.

I firmly believe that Britain is better off in the EU as a result of a fairer society and a more prosperous economy. I'm proud to join a progressive Liberal Democrat in our district to create a new home with the Liberal Democrats.

images.caption: Keith Aspden welcoming the investment with local councillor Anne Hook
